member.name: ICommDlgBrowser.IncludeObject
member.summary: Allows the common dialog box to filter objects that the view displays.
member.param: A pointer to the view's interface.
A PIDL, relative to the folder, that identifies the object.
member.returns: The browser should return S_OK to include the object in the view, or S_FALSE to hide it.

member.name: ICommDlgBrowser.OnDefaultCommand
member.summary: Called when a user double-clicks in the view or presses the ENTER key.
member.param: A pointer to the view's interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICommDlgBrowser.OnStateChange
member.summary: Called after a state, identified by the uChange parameter, has changed in the interface.
member.param: A pointer to the view's interface.

param.name: uChange
param.para: Change in the selection state. This parameter can be one of the following values.
The focus has been set to the view.
The view has lost the focus.
An item has been checked or unchecked.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ICommDlgBrowser
member.summary: Exposed by the common file dialog boxes to be used when they host a Shell browser. If supported, ICommDlgBrowser exposes methods that allow a Shell view to handle several cases that require different behavior in a dialog box than in a normal Shell view. You obtain an ICommDlgBrowser interface pointer by calling on the object.
